title: (No heading)
text: Oct 2 2015 9:41 am AP-SC--Scott-Fiorina Town Hall,89Tim Scott hosts Carly Fiorina for town hall meeting AIKEN, S.C. (AP) â€” Republican presidential candidate Carly Fiorina is sitting down with South Carolina's junior senator to talk presidential politics. Fiorina is scheduled to participate in a town hall meeting with U.S. Sen. Tim Scott on Friday.At the event at the Etherredge Center at the University of South Carolina at Aiken, Fiorina will be answering questions submitted in advance by South Carolina voters.Scott has invited all Republican hopefuls to take part in the hour-long sessions. So far, he's met with candidates including U.S. Sen. Lindsey Graham and businessman Donald Trump. Keywords
